article: a group of people defrauded in a ponzi scheme , where their investments were used to pay fictitious returns to earlier investors , lost a supreme court bid to move to the head of the line in bankruptcy proceedings against a defunct securities firm .
abstract: ponzi scheme victims lose court bid for bankruptcy preference
